name: BomBlox
description:
BomBlox

Shoot balls at blocks to send them flying. They will explode on contact. Yellow things give positive score. Red things give negative score. Try to get the highest score with the fewest shots fired.

Controls: 
  • Turn the camera with [A] and [D].
  • Change the camera's pitch with [W] and [S]. 
  • Aim with the mouse cursor and shoot with the left mouse button 
Credits:

  • Mark Neal
  • Cole Perry
  • Jason Conaway (Game-U Instructor)
